title: Pecha Cucha: lace
abstract:
This text and image piece of work was blind reviewed and published in Textile: the Journal of Cloth and Culture 6:2, July 2008, 112-125. It was accompanied by 23 images (see footnotes or enclosed images).\ud
\ud
The work originated from an invited presentation by Catherine Harper at Fabrica, Brighton in response to Catherine Bertola’s exhibition Prickings at that venue in 2006. Catherine Harper was also commissioned to write the catalogue essay for the exhibition (ISBN 0954338014)
